title: Anonymusx
author: Anonymusx
created_time: June 28, 2023, 04:27:47 PMLast edit: June 28, 2023, 05:15:18 PM by Anonymusx
content: HiMy problem, i need energy, and try Stake TRX, but if i click the "confirm" i see the charge signal spinning around, but  this endless, and nothing happens.This tronscan.org  + use Tronlinkthis:https://i.ibb.co/vYRMwPr/error.pngOr is $4.7 on it too little ?   I searched for the minimum amount of Stake, but could not find it.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Which site is this? I'm not that familiar with the Tron network, but I would imagine you're connected with Tronlink or some other wallet to do this staking? If so, don't you have to confirm whatever action you're trying to do, from the wallet?

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: Anonymusx on June 28, 2023, 04:27:47 PMOr is $4.7 on it too little ?   I searched for the minimum amount of Stake, but could not find it.  1 Tron is the minimum for staking. 1 Tron is not up to $0.01. But this amount is low for any profitable APR.If you are using a wallet to try to stake and it does not work, use another wallet for it. The wallet that I know that can stake also is Trustwallet, but it is close source.

comments.author: Anonymusx
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on June 28, 2023, 04:32:05 PMWhich site is this? I'm not that familiar with the Tron network, but I would imagine you're connected with Tronlink or some other wallet to do this staking? If so, don't you have to confirm whatever action you're trying to do, from the wallet?This tronscan.org  + use Tronlink.   I make succes staking arround 2 month before. then it worked.  Now i dont know what happens.   And i no see need confirm.

comments.author: Anonymusx
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on June 28, 2023, 04:39:05 PMIf you are using a wallet to try to stake and it does not work, use another wallet for it. The wallet that I know that can stake also is Trustwallet, but it is close source.Maybe try.  I can send energy other account? I am a beginner.So i make other account  Trustwallet, and if succes stake, i can send energy?   because i see energy exchange, but this problem, i no can buy, i think need energy for transaction...

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: I think this topic does not belong here. This section is for Bitcoin Discussion. You better move it to the beginner and Help section.It would be best if you edited the OP and add which site it is.

You better move it to the beginner and Help section.It would be best if you edited the OP and add which site it is. ok, sorry, i how can move beginner this posts?

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: Quote from: Anonymusx on June 28, 2023, 05:16:21 PMQuote from: John Abraham on June 28, 2023, 05:12:21 PMI think this topic does not belong here. This section is for Bitcoin Discussion. You better move it to the beginner and Help section.It would be best if you edited the OP and add which site it is. ok, sorry, i how can move beginner this posts? Scroll down to the bottom of this thread, and you will see there is a button named Move topic. Click on it and then select Other -- Beginner & Help and then click on Move topic. I am not sure if there is another better section for this thread. Development & Technical Discussion also fits but it's under Bitcoin Section. Maybe you can wait if some other prominent members could suggest you a better section than Beginner & Help section. Edit: A Moderator already moved this topic to the Service discussion section. You don't have to do anything.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: Anonymusx on June 28, 2023, 05:02:09 PMThis tronscan.org  + use Tronlink.   I make succes staking arround 2 month before. then it worked.  Now i dont know what happens.   And i no see need confirm.Haven't you tried upgrading your tronlink wallet? I checked latest upgrade release is 20th june for android version and 26th june for chrome extension version.Quote from: Anonymusx on June 28, 2023, 05:08:58 PM-snip-So i make other account  Trustwallet, and if succes stake, i can send energy?Trust wallet doesn't support stake 2.0 yet based on my short observation.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: I just try to stake my TRX on TronLink and it's done successfully.I think the problem is your internet connection or your use a low specs device, you can stake TRX as low as 1 TRX. If you problem still not solved yet, you can contact the customer service in official TronLink site [1].Don't trust Trust wallet, that wallet is suck for Tron because they only support ETH and BSC chain.[1] https://www.tronlink.org/

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on June 29, 2023, 06:23:55 AMDon't trust Trust wallet, that wallet is suck for Tron because they only support ETH and BSC chain.Moreover, Trust Wallet was an open-source wallet back in the old days.But they are closed-source wallets now. I discourage everyone from using this.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: Anonymusx on June 28, 2023, 05:08:58 PMMaybe try.  I can send energy other account? I am a beginner.So i make other account  Trustwallet, and if succes stake, i can send energy?   because i see energy exchange, but this problem, i no can buy, i think need energy for transaction... You will generate a wallet on Trustwallet, backup your seed phrase. On Trustwallet, click on 'discover' and you will see a forward arrow at the right side just above some coins to stake, click on the arrow and it will direct you to lists of coins that you can stake on Trustwallet. Trustwallet is close source wallet, I only used it when I have no open source alternatives to use.Quote from: John Abraham on June 29, 2023, 06:39:36 PMMoreover, Trust Wallet was an open-source wallet back in the old days.But they are closed-source wallets now. I discourage everyone from using this.Before Binance bought Trustwallet, it was open source. Binance bought it and made it close source. Close source wallets should be discourage when there are open source ones that are available.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: I was using tronlink wallet on google chrome browser, it worked fine and Stake without problems, maybe you need to upgrade wallet or you don't have enough energy.
